Text: firstly i wanna say great uploads from u ,i love thai movies but hell why dont u ever have any english subs .i am not lazy or nothing i always try and get subs 4 your ups but never can get any whats up with that please comment back because i wanna watch now with english subs cheers
Most Thai movies has no sub. Until They can sell to foreign country (like singapore, Hong Kong, etc..). I bought movies from Thai video shop which has no sub.

Most of the new releases has no subs.
if there are subs then it is mostly custom subs.

Amazingbits has some Thai DVD movies with subs,
if you like Thai movies.

Really wish there were subs, too.

But.......this ain't exactly "Silence of the lambs" or ow't.

Not too many subtle sub-plots to follow, so even I get it.

Thanks for the upload.
